FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( CREATURE_TYPE_ELF ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local counters = filter:Count() local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then if (counters > 0) then target:AddCounters( MTG():PlusOnePlusOneCounters(), counters ) end end
